title: The Acting Duke: Book One in the Bouquet Series
features: Hyacinth Martin is a vivacious American woman who wants her freedom to enjoy London and travel the world, but her father has other ideas. Hoping to control the situation and redirect her father, she hires an actor (or is he an actor?), to play the part of a Duke. Hallie mistakes Sebastian Stainton, eighth Duke of Ashford, for his twin actor brother and hires exactly the wrong (or right) person to play the role in her deception. Sebastian has no plans to marry until he meets a saucy, red-headed vixen with a spunky American attitude who tempts him to do the only devious thing he's ever done in his life. An assassin hired to force Hallie's father to sell his oil refinery to John D. Rockefeller complicates everyone's plans. It is a story of love, intrigue, and delicious deception.
description: Cathy lives in Southern California with her husband and five rescued cats. Her daughter and son have left the nest leaving Cathy to her writing. She earned her BA in Theatre and her MA in Film from San Diego State University. For twenty-five years she was the CEO and founder of the independent San Diego Film Commission and wrote a monthly column for the San Diego Business Journal on filmmaking. In retirement, she loves writing, dating her husband of 48 years, spending time with her five grandchildren, and spoiling her fur babies.
